sys_transform_map.name: Manual Billing Adjustments Transform

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_e60750481b36ec10cd145312604bcb76
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Manual Billing Adjustments Transform</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

    var gr = new GlideRecord("u_rate_code");
    gr.addQuery('u_code', source.u_rate_code);
    gr.addQuery('u_state', '1');
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        target.u_revenue_unit = gr.u_revenue_unit;
        target.u_rate_description = gr.sys_id;
        target.u_rate_value = gr.u_rate_value;
        target.u_total = gr.u_rate_value * source.u_quantity;
        var qry = 'revenue_unit=' + gr.u_revenue_unit;
        var grRU = new GlideRecord('x_soud2_manual_bil_revenue_unit_approvers');
        grRU.addEncodedQuery(qry);
        grRU.query();
        if (grRU.next()) {
            target.u_ru_approver = grRU.sys_id.getDisplayValue();
        } else {
            gs.info('MB revenue unit approver not found  ' + source.u_rate_code);
        }

    } else {
        gs.info('MB rate rot not found for rate code of  ' + source.u_rate_code);
    }

})(source, target, map, log, action === "update");]]></script><source_table>x_soud2_manual_bil_manual_billing_adjustments</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dyearsley</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-04 21:54:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e60750481b36ec10cd145312604bcb76</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manual Billing Adjustments Transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Manual Billing" source="x_soud2_manual_bil">a369cbe31bf7e3005ae0c91e1e4bcb51</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Manual Billing">a369cbe31bf7e3005ae0c91e1e4bcb51</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_e60750481b36ec10cd145312604bcb76</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dyearsley</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-04 21:55:30</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_soud2_manual_bil_adjustment_details</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
